mapper.insert: insert into(workLogNum, memberNum, subject, todayWork, nextdayWork, memo) values(workLog_seq.nextval, #{memberNum}, #{subject}, #{todayWork}, #{nextdayWork}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM workLog w JOIN member m ON w.memberNum=m.memberNum JOIN department d on m.departmentNum = d.departmentNum
